t: Rovio Entertainment - Wikipedia
s: 2 weeks ago - Rovio Entertainment Oy (formerly Relude Oy and Rovio Mobile Oy) is a Finnish video game developer and publisher based in Espoo. Founded in 2003 by Helsinki University of Technology students Niklas Hed, Jarno Väkeväinen and Kim Dikert, the company is best known for the Angry Birds franchise.

t: AWS Case Study: Rovio
s: Finland-based Rovio Entertainment is the entertainment media company behind such games as Angry Birds, Bad Piggies, Angry Birds Star Wars I & II, and The Croods. Angry Birds became a sensation a few months after its release, and the games are now some of the most popular of all time with more ...

t: Rovio Archives - CodeNgo | The Business of App Development
s: With over 1 billion downloads across web and mobile, Angry Birds is no doubt as big as they get. But what is also fairly well known is Rovio’s ability to merchandise the brand very quickly. Now Amazon is out to help developers do the same, with ‘merch’ by Amazon.
